title: Photograph, "View of a side altar in an unidentified church", 1904–13
title_raw: View of a side altar in an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Horizontal rectangle: Side altar; a chalice in a relief medallion, center. Above, a crucifix surmounting the tabernacle. Door at right; a plain pointed arch. At left, a thick column with oak(?) leaves at the top, pews in foreground.

Same church as 1961-83-10.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "View of a side altar in an unidentified church", 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-11.
